name: LabelBeams
description: Labels Beams with a Text processing with an optional custom string input

inputParameters.name: Model
inputParameters.description: Model whose beams should be labeled.

inputParameters.name: BaseString
inputParameters.description: String to be applied to each Beam. If none is given, a standard identifier will be used.

inputParameters.name: CharToReplace
inputParameters.description: Optional character in the BaseString to be replaced by Beam.attributes. This only works if Attributes is not empty and a single BaseString is given.

inputParameters.name: Attributes
inputParameters.description: Beam attribute names to substitute into the BaseString.
